dcterms:creator: M. Zampieri
S. Malmasi
P. Nakov
S. Rosenthal
N. Farra
R. Kumar
dcterms:description: A dataset for identifying and categorizing offensive language in social media, specifically designed for the SemEval-2019 task 6. It includes annotations for whether messages are offensive, whether they have a target, and the type of target.
dcterms:title: OLID/OffensEval

dcterms:description: A newly created resource based on the OLID/OffensEval dataset, focusing on the explicitness of abusive language messages. It aims to address issues in the annotation of offensive and abusive language.
dcterms:title: AbuseEval v1.0

dcterms:creator: V. Basile
C. Bosco
E. Fersini
D. Nozza
V. Patti
F. M. Rangel Pardo
P. Rosso
M. Sanguinetti
dcterms:description: A dataset for multilingual detection of hate speech against immigrants and women on Twitter, created for the SemEval-2019 task 5.
dcterms:title: HatEval
